column1: The family will receive friends and loved ones from 5:00 to 7:00 p.m. Monday evening at the funeral home prior to the Rosary.  Mass of Christian Burial  will be celebrated on Tuesday
column3: 2015 at 2:00 p.m. at St. Patrick Catholic Church with Fr. Raymundo Garcia
column4: celebrant. Interment will follow in the Forest Haven Cemetery in Diboll. Rosary will be recited at 7:00 p.m. Monday at Carroway Funeral Home in Lufkin.
